subject: Soccer
organizations: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
lead_paragraph: Orlando City, which rose from soccer’s lower tiers, will play New York City F.C., a team built from scratch, at the sold-out Citrus Bowl on Sunday.
snippet: Orlando City, which rose from soccer’s lower tiers, will play New York City F.C., a team built from scratch, at the sold-out Citrus Bowl on Sunday.
